00001 import java.awt.Point;
00002 import java.util.Arrays;
00003 
00005 
00023 public class GameState_Opt8x8 implements GameStateModule
00024 {
00025         private final static int WIDTH = 8;
00026         private final static int HEIGHT = 8;
00028         private final static int FD = HEIGHT + 1;
00030         private final static int BD = HEIGHT - 1;
00031         private final static int SIZE = HEIGHT * WIDTH;
00033         private final static long BUT_TOP = 0x7F7F7F7F7F7F7F7FL;
00035         private final long color[] = new long[2];
00037         private final byte moves[] = new byte[SIZE];
00039         private int nplies = 0;
00040         private int coins = 0;
00042         private final byte Heights[] = new byte[WIDTH];
00043         private boolean gameOver = false;
00044         private int Winner = -1;
00045         private boolean pointsComputed = false;
00046         private Point startPoint;
00047         private Point endPoint;
00048 
00050 
00055         public GameState_Opt8x8()
00056         {
00057                 Arrays.fill(color, 0L);
00058                 Arrays.fill(moves, (byte)0);
00059                 Arrays.fill(Heights, (byte)0);
00060         }
00061 
00063         public GameState_Opt8x8 copy()
00064         {
00065                 final GameState_Opt8x8 game = new GameState_Opt8x8();
00066                 System.arraycopy(color, 0, game.color, 0, 2);
00067                 System.arraycopy(moves, 0, game.moves, 0, SIZE);
00068                 System.arraycopy(Heights, 0, game.Heights, 0, WIDTH);
00069                 game.nplies = nplies;
00070                 game.coins = coins;
00071                 game.gameOver = gameOver;
00072                 game.Winner = Winner;
00073                 return game;
00074         }

00081         private boolean computeVictory(final long board)
00082         {
00083                 // VERTICAL |
00084                 long temp = board;
00085                 temp &= (temp & BUT_TOP) << 1;
00086                 temp &= (temp & BUT_TOP) << 1;
00087                 temp &= (temp & BUT_TOP) << 1;
00088                 if(temp != 0)
00089                         return true;
00090 
00091                 // HORIZONTAL --
00092                 temp = board;
00093                 temp &= temp << HEIGHT;
00094                 temp &= temp << HEIGHT;
00095                 temp &= temp << HEIGHT;
00096                 if(temp != 0)
00097                         return true;
00098 
00099                 // DIAGONAL /
00100                 temp = board;
00101                 temp &= (temp & BUT_TOP) << FD;
00102                 temp &= (temp & BUT_TOP) << FD;
00103                 temp &= (temp & BUT_TOP) << FD;
00104                 if(temp != 0)
00105                         return true;
00106 
00107                 // DIAGONAL \
00108                 temp = board;
00109                 temp &= (temp & BUT_TOP) >> BD;
00110                 temp &= (temp & BUT_TOP) >> BD;
00111                 temp &= (temp & BUT_TOP) >> BD;
00112                 return (temp != 0);
00113         }
00114 
00116 
00122         public boolean canMakeMove(final int x)
00123         {
00124                 return x >= 0 && x < WIDTH && Heights[x] < HEIGHT && !gameOver;
00125         }
00126 
00128 
00137         public void makeMove(final int x)
00138         {
00139                 if(!canMakeMove(x))
00140             throw new RuntimeException("Illegal Move: " + x);
00141                 color[nplies & 1] |= 1L << (x * HEIGHT + Heights[x]);
00142                 ++Heights[x];
00143                 ++coins;
00144                 if(computeVictory(color[nplies & 1]))
00145         {
00146             gameOver = true;
00147             Winner = (nplies & 1) + 1;
00148         }
00149         else if(coins == SIZE)
00150         {
00151             gameOver = true;
00152             Winner = 0;
00153         }
00154         moves[nplies++] = (byte)x;
00155         }
00156 
00158 
00165         public void unMakeMove()
00166         {
00167                 final int x = moves[--nplies];
00168                 --Heights[x];
00169         color[nplies & 1] ^= 1L << (x * HEIGHT + Heights[x]);
00170         --coins;
00171         gameOver = false;
00172         pointsComputed = false;
00173         }
00174 
00176 
00179         public boolean isGameOver()
00180         {
00181                 return gameOver;
00182         }
00183 
00185 
00195         public int getWinner()
00196         {
00197                 if(!gameOver)
00198             throw new RuntimeException("Cannot get winner; game isn't over.");
00199         return Winner;
00200         }
00201 
00203 
00207         public int getActivePlayer()
00208         {
00209                 return (nplies & 1) + 1;
00210         }

00213 
00222         public int getAt(final int x, final int y)
00223         {
00224                 final long bit = 1L << (x * HEIGHT + y);
00225         if((color[0] & bit) != 0)
00226             return 1;
00227         if((color[1] & bit) != 0)
00228             return 2;
00229         return 0;
00230         }
00231

00237         public int getHeightAt(final int x)
00238         {
00239                 return Heights[x];

00264         public int getCoins()

00276         public Point getStartPt()
00277         {
00278                 if(!gameOver)
00279                         throw new RuntimeException("Cannot get start/end points until the game is over");
00280                 if(!pointsComputed || startPoint == null)
00281                         computePoints();
00282                 if(startPoint == null)
00283                         throw new RuntimeException("Could not compute points");
00284                 return startPoint;
00285         }
00286 
00288 
00294         public Point getEndPt()
00295         {
00296                 if(!gameOver)
00297                         throw new RuntimeException("Cannot get start/end points until the game is over");
00298                 if(!pointsComputed || endPoint == null)
00299                         computePoints();
00300                 if(endPoint == null)
00301                         throw new RuntimeException("Could not compute points");
00302                 return endPoint;
00303         }
00304 
00306         private void computePoints()
00307         {
00308                 if(Winner == 0)
00309                 {
00310                         startPoint = new Point(-1, -1);
00311                         endPoint = new Point(-1, -1);
00312                 }
00313 
00314                 for(int x = 0; x < WIDTH; x++)
00315                         for(int y = 0; y < HEIGHT; y++)
00316                         {
00317                                 if(getAt(x, y) != Winner)
00318                                         continue;
00319                                 for(int dx = -1; dx <= 1; dx++)
00320                                         next:
00321                                         for(int dy = -1; dy <= 1; dy++)
00322                                         {
00323                                                 if(dx == dy && dy == 0)
00324                                                         continue;
00325                                                 if(x + (3 * dx) >= WIDTH)
00326                                                         continue;
00327                                                 if(y + (3 * dy) >= HEIGHT)
00328                                                         continue;
00329                                                 if(x + (3 * dx) < 0)
00330                                                         continue;
00331                                                 if(y + (3 * dy) < 0)
00332                                                         continue;
00333                                                 for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00334                                                         if(getAt(x + (i * dx), y + (i * dy)) != Winner)
00335                                                                 continue next;
00336                                                 startPoint = new Point(x, y);
00337                                                 endPoint = new Point(x + (3 * dx), y + (3 * dy));
00338                                                 return;
00339                                         }
00340                         }
00341         }
00342 }
